label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_006
content:

### Events
- Replaced failing disk on stor-b-19 and completed rebuild in 6.2 hours; confirmed no under-replicated objects remain.
- Two storage nodes restarted after planned NIC driver parameter change; validated stable link and reduced network drops thereafter.
- Rebalance completed more jobs than started, clearing queue to depth 3; hottest-node utilization fell by ~0.6%.
- Updated quota alert thresholds to warn at 90/95% and added weekly report for top 10 fastest-growing tenants.

### On Call
- Shift: Jae M.
- Pages: 3
- Tickets: 6
- Status: Stable
- Minor Maintenance Executed Successfully
- Capacity Trend: Steady Upward
- Improved Rebalance Effectiveness
